title: Stocks to Watch: What's Ahead for the Financial Markets
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin speaks with deputy editor Ben Levisohn and Robert Phipps, a partner at Per Stirling, a Texas-based investment advisory firm. They discuss the findings of Barron's latest Big Money poll of institutional investors, the macroeconomic outlook, third-quarter earnings, and individual stocks.
